Coinbase's SEC Clash Faces First Major Test as Judge Weighs Longshot Dismissal https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/01/16/coinbases-sec-clash-faces-first-major-test-as-judge-weighs-longshot-dismissal/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines PWOLQTKFJFCQHD6OONQPT4HDC4 Jesse HamiltonCoinbase is about to make its case in a federal courtroom that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is wrong about its legal arguments that the crypto exchange has been trading unregistered securities. What the New York judge does next could have serious consequences for the wider industry's clashes with the regulator. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 20:25:20 +0000 2024-01-16T20:30:24.588+00:00 PolicynewsRegulationsSDNYLegalCoinbaseSecurities and Exchange CommissionCoinbase is getting set to tell a judge why the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, under Chair Gary Gensler, has improperly picked a legal fight with the exchange. (Jesse Hamilton/CoinDesk)杰西·汉密尔顿
